headline: Corvus Pharmaceuticals Stock Rallies 209% in a Month: Here's Why
summary: CRVS stock surges 209% in a month after positive cohort 4 phase I data show durable eczema responses for soquelitinib.

headline: Regeneron (REGN) Posted Solid Quarterly Results, Eyes 2026 Pipeline Catalysts
summary: Chautauqua Capital Management, a division of Baird Asset Management, is a boutique investment firm that released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter for the “Baird Chautauqua International and Global Growth Fund”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here.
